description:
The first MSX computer / ColecoVision emulator for WebOS, based on BlueMSX. It supports the original model up to the TurboR. Future updates will also add support for the Sega SG-1000. The majority of BlueMSX features required to run most games are already supported with more coming soon (tape support, improved on-screen keyboard, etc). Please verify your games/programs run on the PC version if you're unsure about purchasing, and feel free to email me with any questions.

Important info for WebOS 1.4.5 users: You must use a fixed version of the OS that allows write access to /media/internal or the app will not function properly.

Note: Additional MSX system files are required to use the app with floppy disk images. A BIOS is needed if emulating ColecoVision. See the website for setup instructions.

Features include:
* Supports ROM (.rom, .mx1, .mx2, .col) and Disk (.dsk) programs, optionally in zip files
* SCC and FM sound support
* Internal SRAM and save state support, auto-save and ten manual slots for save states.
* Configurable on-screen multi-touch controls & keyboard support
* iCade support (WebOS 2.0 or later)
* Portrait/Landscape orientation support

Follow me on Twitter for updates about my apps:
https://twitter.com/rakashazi

Visit the homepage at explusalpha.com for more info, ports for other platforms, and my other apps.
